t: Matthew 24
Destruction of the Temple Predicted
As*p Jesus left and was going out of the temple, his disciples came up and called his attention to its buildings.
He replied to them, “Do*r you*r see*r all*r these*r things?*r Truly*r I*r tell*r you,*r not*r one*r stone*r will*r be*r left*r here*r on*r another*r that*r will*r not*r be*r thrown*r down.”*r

While*p he was sitting on the Mount of Olives, the disciples approached him privately and said, “Tell us, when will these things happen? And what is the sign of your coming and of the end of the age?”
Jesus*p replied to them, “Watch*r out*r that*r no*r one*r deceives*r you.*r

No One Knows the Day or Hour
“Now*rp concerning*r that*r day*r and*r hour*r no*r one*r knows — neither*r the*r angels*r of*r heaven*r nor*r the*r Son*r — except*r the*r Father*r alone.*r
